resources.string: Sleek, bi-level setting for upscale New American fare with fixed price and tasting menus.
Daniel Bouluds elegant French flagship where jackets are required and expense accounts come in handy.
Chef Thomas Kellers New American restaurant offers luxe fixed-price menus, with Central Park views.
Grand Army Plaza is a public plaza that comprises the northern corner and the main entrance of Prospect Park in the New York City borough of Brooklyn.
Sleek, bi-level setting for upscale New American fare with fixed price and tasting menus.
Daniel Bouluds elegant French flagship where jackets are required and expense accounts come in handy.
Daniel Bouluds cafe is run by chef Aaron Bludorn, serving high-end French fare in a chic setting.
